title: Klondike Gold Rush - Seattle Unit National Historical Park: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar             Calendar       Most of our programs are listed in Upcoming Events & Exhibits. Anniversary and special events are listed below.          Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 8 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Klondike Gold Rush - Seattle Unit National Historical Park Exhibit: A Century of Service      Time: 10:00 AM to 5:00 PM Location: Visitor Center Temporary Exhibit area Fees: free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Everyday  from 04/01/2016 to 09/07/2016 Temporary exhibit View Details      Klondike Gold Rush - Seattle Unit National Historical Park Park Films      Location: Visitor Center Theater Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Everyday  from 06/19/2016 to 09/05/2016 Park films screened on the hour and half-hour all day long View Details      Klondike Gold Rush - Seattle Unit National Historical Park Trail to Treasure Walking Tour      Location: meet in the visitor center Fees: free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Every Sunday Weekly & Every Friday Weekly & Every Saturday Weekly  from 06/24/2016 to 09/04/2016 Join us for a hour, guided tour of Pioneer Square!
